name: John D. Archbold Memorial Hospital Reviews

review.title: “Excellent company to work for.”
review.pros: Pros – Wonderful staff and caring physicians to work for. Great learning experience and insight to the needs associated in a hospital environment.
review.cons: Cons – Had to relocate out of state and the company is not where I moved to. Unable to get company insurance being a contract employee.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Look closer at hiring employees direct versus contract.

review.title: “It was the best place to work for.”
review.pros: Pros – The on the job training,continue education,benefits all great.
review.cons: Cons – None to my knowledge,everything wonderful..
review.advice-to-management: – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Good Place to learn new things.”
review.pros: Pros – You will meet all types of people that are willing to help. Archbold is always growing. They have a scholarship for students who want to become nurses.
review.cons: Cons – The pay is one of the worst things at Archbold. You basically work hard for a low pay rate for most of the positions.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Create a new pay scale. We really need it in this tough economy.
